section.title: Aim of the &productName;
section.para: The &productName; provides several possibilities to compare visually two Mind architectures.
The two Mind architectures compared can be either:

listitem.para: 2 versions of a component, &productName; output can be used to show what has been removed, added and modified between the 2 versions.
2 similar components, &productName; output can be used to show what is common between the components, in other words, what are the re-used components inside.
